description:
Share and schedule posts from your Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and Foursquare accounts all from one app.

Hootsuite is the world's most popular social media management app and is FREE for up to 3 social network accounts.

What people are saying:

"Excellent... Hootsuite's beauty is its streamlined nature." – PC Magazine
"...offers unrivaled features like post scheduling and statistics tracking." – CNET
"This is no doubt the best client for professional social media users" – Engadget
"The app looks lovely, and if multiple [social] accounts are your thing, it works wonders." – MacWorld

Use the Hootsuite Mobile App to:

* Bring the power of Hootsuite into the palm of your hand
* Share messages with your favourite social networks within one app
* Use Autoschedule to spread messages out over a number of days, which is great for time management
* View and manage all of your favourite social networks from one place
* Use the Ow.ly link shortener to track click-through stats

The Hootsuite mobile app is the perfect companion to your Hootsuite account. Get started right from the mobile app!

Sign up for Hootsuite for FREE at www.hootsuite.com

Questions?
Twitter: @hootsuite
Facebook: http://facebook.com/hootsuite
trackCensoredName: Hootsuite for Twitter & Social Media Scheduling
trackName: Hootsuite for Twitter & Social Media Scheduling
releaseNotes:
- You can now share from more apps through Hootsuite. The new share extension has been enhanced to work with Safari, Flipboard, BuzzFeed, CNN, Instapaper, and countless more apps!
- Updated for iOS 8.1
- Lots of minor bug fixes

If you experience any issues or want to give us feedback, tweet to us @HootsuiteGlobal or visit http://hootsuite.com/help. We're happy to help!
